snippet: Brittney Griner scored 24 points in 18 minutes as Baylor opened defense of its national championship with an 80-34 win against Lamar.
lead_paragraph: Brittney Griner scored 24 points in 18 minutes as Baylor opened defense of its national championship with an 80-34 win against Lamar.

headline.seo: Baylor Women Open Season With 41st Straight Win
headline.main: Baylor Women Open Season With 41st Straight Win
headline.print_headline: Baylor Opens Season With 41st Straight Win
